Alle Klassen und Schnittstellen

Klassen
Klasse
Beschreibung
Baron
Class for creating an instance of type 'Baron' card.
Card
Abstract Card class with two constructors and default get-Method for the card number.
Client
The Client class represents a server application.
ClientMain
Main class with the main method of the client application.
ConnectingThread
Instances of this class are created and started by the server instance after a client connection is accepted.
Countess
Class for creating an instance of type 'Countess' card.
Deck
The Deck class represents a deck of cards used in the game.
Game
The Game class represents the game logic and manages relationships between players and game attributes.
Guard
Class for creating an instance of type 'Guard' card.
Hand
Instances of this class represent players' hands of cards.
Handmaid
Class for creating an instance of type 'Handmaid' card.
King
Class for creating an instance of type 'King' card.
Priest
Class for creating an instance of type 'Priest' card.
Prince
Class for creating an instance of type 'Prince' card.
Princess
Class for creating an instance of type 'Princess' card.
ReceivingThread
This class represents a thread for receiving messages from the server and displaying them to the user.
Server
The Server class represents a server application.
ServerMain
Main class with the main method of the server application.
ServerThread
Instances of the ServerThread class handle requests send by their associate clients.
UserThread
This class represents a thread for receiving messages from the user and passing them to the server.
